name: The Arena (GoofyPomPom)
description:
Player movement: WASD

Zoom out: Mouse Scroll

Rotate X axis camera: Click & drag right click

Esc = Open/close Menu (Doesn't pause)

SwordAttack = E

_________________________________

There are currently 5 waves in the game. beat all 5 and win the game! 

Goal: 

Don't let the enemy reach the totem 5 times and  be careful not to  get hit by the goblins so much!

_______________________________

Additional Infos:

- The yellow cubes that are everywhere are called 'Slot' and that's where you will be building your turrets and building (acivate  by going near them)

_________________________________

Did you realize?: 

- The purple tower can redirect in range enemies target from the totem into itself until it got destroyed.  this is a passive ability called 'Taunt'.

- That if you press E and then E again in less than  .17 s there will be a combo? :)

- You can put turrets on the purple tower! 

- Everytime you lend a last hit on the enemy yourself you gain +6.3$ !

______________________________

How it connects the theme: (Less is more)

- The less  money you have the higher it is the probability for you to win! (Multitask! go go!)

_____________________________

Q & A:

1: why are the goblin so dumb? they can barely navigate to the totem properly!

A: the goblin was granted a 5-minute-navmesh brain

2: why are the scenery models looks so nice while the player character and goblin doesn't even get a 3D model?

A: Hey! cubes and cylinders are 3D models too

3: why are there a very small amount of animation?

A: the player movement is the animation
